entry.title: $2658 // Modern Spacious Light Filled Three Bed w/d Boutique BLDG PRIME loc
entry.content:
Exciting brand new development in Prime Bushwick!
Bushwick's newest boutique 8-unit new construction has hit the market at 69 Stockholm! Inspired by renaissance interior design, every residence comes serviced with in-unit washers and dryers, dishwashers, and huge floor-to-ceiling windows with southeast exposure for terrific natural light! Kitchens and bathrooms are finished with fine Carrera caeserstone and marble in the countertops and backsplashes, in addition to wide-cut oak flooring and high ceilings. And what unit wouldn't be complete without outdoor spaces?! Residents are accommodated with a communal 24-hour roof deck with skyline views, and private balconies in select units as well!

Enjoy a cup of coffee over at Little Skips, or try out Bizarre Bar on Jefferson! Head over to Mominette, Three Diamond Door, or The Bushwick Starr for entertainment! You're just three blocks from the Central Ave M-train, Kosciuszko J-train, and less than 10 minutes from the Dekalb L! This building was meant to be your next home :)

- Washer/Dryer in Unit
- Stainless Appliances
- Dishwasher
- Roof Deck
- Central Air/Heat
- Massive Windows
- Queen size Bedrooms
- Massive Windows
- Tall Ceilings
- Tons of Sunlight
- Pets Allowed
- Only First & Security

Great unit, will rent quickly! Net rent advertised based on one month free. For additional information or to schedule a private viewing contact Allen directly at show contact info text for fastest response. We have access to a ton of no fee listings and off market properties, so let me know how I can assist finding you the perfect home!
